title: OBE-Based e-Learning Assessment System for Enhancing Practical Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment emphasizing job relevance for in-service professionals, with flexible learning activities designed using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can utilize e-rubric assessment tools provided by e-learning platforms to solve given math problems with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can diagnose their learning levels into three stages (High/Medium/Low) by analyzing five activity performance variables (frequency, time, sequence, etc.) set according to OBE principles.
Learners can apply personalized learning stages and activity improvement directions with over 80% satisfaction by utilizing the system’s rule-based recommendation algorithm.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
